ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Really cool corpse locating tip
ygData.msgSnippet: I tried the /loc thing and it gives the loc of you not the bind sight target. My guess is that locating lyric would not work in conjunction with an eye of
ygData.messageBody:
I tried the /loc thing and it gives the loc of you not the bind sight
target.

My guess is that locating lyric would not work in conjunction with an eye of
zomm.

Rokenn



> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
> Sent: Thursday, December 28, 2000 1:28 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Really cool corpse locating tip
>
>
> Does anyone know how the /loc command works when you bind
> sight? I assume
> it still tells you your current location and not the location
> of where the
> target is that you have bound your sight to. Would be neat
> if we could
> target someone who died, locate their corpse, bind sight to
> their corpse,
> and then tell them the /loc of it.
>
> I'll give it a try tonight to test it for myself.
>
> What about if you have a SS helm and summon the Eye of Zomm?
> Can you summon
> the Eye, turn on the corpse locating song, and then lead the
> person to their
> corpse with the Eye instead of going yourself? This could be
> useful in
> situations when you don't want to leave your party.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: John Tatsukawa [mailto:john@...]
> Sent: Thursday, December 28, 2000 11:15 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com; 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Really cool corpse locating tip
>
>
> I used it last month to help someone out of the canyon in The
> Overthere.
> Definitely works.
>
> ---Windleaf
>
> At 09:01 AM 12/28/00 -0600, Mott, Mike J. wrote:
> >Wow I dont know if it works....but I am certainly gonna try
> that! Seems
> >ultra useful in Dungeons.
> >
> >Lago
> >
> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Talies the Wanderer [SMTP:snicker@...]
> > > Sent: Thursday, December 28, 2000 9:09 AM
> > > To: eqbards@egroups.com
> > > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Really cool corpse locating tip
> > >
> > > Was going through my archives, and since I recently
> learned that my
> > > websites are apparently referenced in the Prima strategy
> guide, I'd
> better
> > >
> > > keep them active.
> > > So can someone tell me if this trick ever worked, and if
> it still does?
> > >
> > > Thanks!
> > > Talies
> > >
> > > At 04:21 PM 2/25/00 -0500, you wrote:
> > > >From: <kim@...>
> > > >
> > > >First you use Locating Lyric like you normally do. It'll
> > > >point you in the direction of the corpse, but more
> > > >importantly, it'll make the corpse your current target.
> > > >
> > > >Next you use Solidarity of Vision (L34) to bind sight to the
> > > >corpse. Switch to an external camera view, rotate around, and
> > > >usually you can tell from the surroundings exactly where the
> > > >corpse is. VERY useful for finding corpses in dangerous
> > > >sections of a dungeon, or if the corpse isn't where the person
> > > >thinks he died.
> > > >
> > > >--
> > > >John H. Kim
> > > >kim@...
> > > >
> > > >
